div.p: - Maintain various communication mediums, such as websites and status reports used to communicate goals, current focuses, and progress. - Track product development issues and work with the team to determine solutions. - Manage, track, and filter internal bug reports using Apple's bug tracking database software. - Contribute to the continual improvement and automation of our internal process by enhancing existing project tools or creating new ones as required. - Interaction with all levels of engineers and managers. - Track and manage cross functional requirements. - Communicate project schedules, status and potential risks. - Facilitating communication between cross-functional groups is critical. - Must thrive in a fast-paced environment.
